channel.title: Ubuntu on 世情如紙
channel.description: Recent content in Ubuntu on 世情如紙

item.title: [.NET Core] 在 Ubuntu 20.04 上佈屬 .NET Core 3.1 (使用 Nginx 反向代理)
item.description: 設置 Ubuntu 安裝 .NET Core Runtime 1 2 3 4 5 wget https://packages.microsoft.com/config/ubuntu/20.04/packages-microsoft-prod.deb sudo dpkg -i packages-microsoft-prod.deb sudo apt update sudo apt install apt-transport-https sudo apt install dotnet-runtime-3.1 安裝 Nginx 新增套件來源，新增檔案 /etc/apt/sources.list.d/nginx.list 1 2 3 #/etc/apt/sources.list.d/nginx.list. deb https://nginx.org/packages/ubuntu/ focal nginx deb-src https://nginx.org/packages/ubuntu/ focal nginx 安裝 1 2 sudo apt update sudo apt install nginx -y 啟

item.title: [Linux] 在 Ubuntu 20.04 中設置 vim plugin YouCompleteMe
item.description: 安裝 junegunn/vim-plug 管理套件 以指令安裝 junegunn/vim-plug 1 2 curl -fLo ~/.vim/autoload/plug.vim --create-dirs \ https://raw.githubusercontent.com/junegunn/vim-plug/master/plug.vim 在 ~/.vimrc 加入 Plug ‘ycm-core/YouCompleteMe’ 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 " Specify a directory for plugins call plug#begin('~/.vim/plugged') Plug 'ycm-core/YouCompleteMe' " Initialize plugin system call plug#end() 打開 vim，在 vim 命令列輸入安裝 Plugin 的指令下
